sources.title: Apocalypse Pompeii | Full Disaster Adventure Movie
sources.description:
**This film is under license from The Asylum.  All rights reserved**

Apocalypse Pompeii - When a Former Special Ops commando visits Pompeii, his wife and daughter are trapped as Mt. Vesuvius erupts with massive force. While his family fights to survive the deadly onslaught of heat and lava, he enlists his former teammates in a daring operation beneath the ruins of Pompeii.

2014
Stars: Adrian Paul, Jhey Castles, Georgina Beedle, John Rhys-Davies

★ Awesome Movies 

Welcome to the Movie Central. Subscribe and watch more Awesome Movies. 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGBzBkV-MinlBvHBzZawfLQ/playlists
